author: cbernet
body:
Latest version of the Heppy analysis software package, tested in 7_4_1_patch1. 
This PR affects one package that does not belong to Heppy, EgammaAnalysis/ElectronTools. 
These changes have also been requested by @dimarco here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9006. 

@gpetruc @arizzi
title: Heppy 74X integration
